mapper.select: select distinct e.emp_id from board b left join employee e on b.emp_seq = e.emp_seq where board_seq = #{board_seq}

select b.board_seq, e.emp_name as emp_seq, b.board_category, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_orgname, b.board_savname, b.board_regdate, b.board_hitcount from board b left join employee e on b.emp_seq = e.emp_seq WHERE
BOARD_TITLE EMP_NAME BOARD_CONTENT
LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} ||'%' ORDER BY BOARD_SEQ DESC

SELECT board_seq , emp_seq , board_category , board_title , board_content , board_hitcount , to_char(board_regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as board_regdate , board_orgname , board_savname FROM board WHERE board_seq = #{board_seq} ORDER BY BOARD_SEQ DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_orgname = null, board_savname = null WHERE board_seq=#{board_seq}
mapper.insert: insert into BOARD_COMMENTS ( BOARD_COMMENTS_SEQ, BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_COMMENTS_WRITER, BOARD_COMMENTS_CONTENT, BOARD_COMMENTS_REGDATE ) values ( board_comments_seqs.nextval, #{board_seq}, #{board_comments_writer}, #{board_comments_content}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select board_comments_seq, board_seq, board_comments_writer, board_comments_content, board_comments_regdate from BOARD_COMMENTS where board_seq = #{board_seq} order by board_comments_seq desc
